Articles.Content:
Hello!

I enjoy making mods, and I am pretty satisfied with Atlas Spacecraft Systems. However, it has been a bit overshadowed by the much-higher-quality Near Future Propulsion. So I have concluded that there wasn't as much demand for an alternate VASIMR mod. So now, I ask you, the players, what do YOU want?

**-Lander parts:** More bits and pieces to build landers. Low profile engines, legs, lander cans, staging mechanisms.

**-Artifical Gravity Rings:** Nice big toruses for building interplanetary ships. Deployable and non-deployable.

**-Probe Parts:** Nice big probe cores, Telescopes, Probe landers, and Rovers?

**-New Solar Panel:** ![vZ91d8.gif](http://share.gifyoutube.com/vZ91d8.gif) might just start working on this one now. It would be pretty cool to have working.

So that's what I'm going to put in the poll. Please, let me know if you have any other ideas.

SmallFatFetus

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-27T02:18:01Z" title="07/27/2015 02:18  AM" data-short="8 yr">July 27, 2015</time> by SmallFatFetus**
What about some satellite like Dawn, Ulysses, New Horizons ?

Hmmm, I don't know. If I made them, I feel like they would be too much of a replica. I think I will release a quick little science experiment pack, triangular probe core and antenna for new horizons though. I just modeled the LORRI, what should I call it?

Look at AIES mod and make the small probe lander parts antenna etc everyone loves the AIES parts but unfortunately the owner has not been around for a long time so if you make something very similar you will have a wide audience or contact him and see if you can take it over

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-27T04:46:04Z" title="07/27/2015 04:46  AM" data-short="8 yr">July 27, 2015</time> by Virtualgenius**
It seems you already have some very pretty ideas, why don't you try to make a parts pack with some of them?

I put in a request awhile ago for someone to please make me hexagonal solar cells but nobody did it. Think you might want to give it a whirl?

![EYUIsXH.png](http://i.imgur.com/EYUIsXH.png)

Someone recently was looking for curved parts for habitat toruses. Fustek or equivalent or the Kerbal Planetary Base Systems are all flat and so require fancy rotating and offseting in construction to work which isn't quite as satisfying as a curved section.

Why not try your hand at that? 

Peace.
Have you given any thought on what you were going to make?

What about Black radial ORE tanks there isnt any at all

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-30T04:48:47Z" title="07/30/2015 04:48  AM" data-short="8 yr">July 30, 2015</time> by Virtualgenius**

What about a battery mod that looks like this?

![640x0.jpg?fit=scale176x176.jpg?fit=scale&background=FFFFFF](http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/c4591c1454ef454fafcb701e0e5bba3b/640x0.jpg?fit=scale176x176.jpg?fit=scale&background=FFFFFF)

> 
> ~Update~
> I am on a bit of a hiatus while I take a summer class, so it's going to be a little while before I get back. I also need to renew my photoshop license, so no new updates for at least a few weeks. 
> 
> When I am able to return to modding, I will delete this post and let you guys know what I'm working on.

Thank you all for your suggestions! I'll get right on these when I get back!

@Kuansenhama, I am animating your hexagonal panels now. Hopefully before I leave I can put a gif of the animation up here.

@Virtualgenius Great Idea! Shouldn't be too hard either. Just gotta get that photoshop license.

![iBfloTa.gif](http://i.imgur.com/iBfloTa.gif)

Solar panel animation is just about done!

What about Ramps for Rover Landers a bit like this allow you to make your own lander you just do ramp bit 

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/47765-Space-Factory](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/47765-Space-Factory)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-04T21:49:02Z" title="08/04/2015 09:49  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 4, 2015</time> by Virtualgenius**

> 
> What about Ramps for Rover Landers a bit like this allow you to make your own lander you just do ramp bit 
> [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/47765-Space-Factory](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/47765-Space-Factory)

That part still works, I'm still using it ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) makes a nice cargo lander.

Woo! Your doing the hex panels? Thanks so much! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) I can't wait to see the finished product!

I was wondering how you would animate/store those panels in the B config. I see you really had a creative solution for it.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-14T00:10:44Z" title="08/14/2015 12:10  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 14, 2015</time> by Kuansenhama**

I know you're out, but I saw what you were doing with my hex panels idea. I'll just leave this here...
